# ssp-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                     | Type     | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `icon`     | `icon`     | The icon name                                                                                   | `string` | `undefined` |
| `label`    | `label`    | The button label                                                                                | `string` | `undefined` |
| `position` | `position` | The position of the icon                                                                        | `string` | `undefined` |
| `type`     | `type`     | The button type ('simple-button', 'button-with-icon', 'button-link' or 'button-link-with-icon') | `string` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event         | Description                       | Type                   |
| ------------- | --------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `buttonEvent` | The event emitter on button click | `CustomEvent<boolean>` |
